title: Slade
description: "Sexy. Hot. Leigh leaves you craving more!" - K. Bromberg, New York Times Bestselling Author of DrivenSavage Slade, that's been my nickname since I was a kid--and it's for a reason. I play Mr. Nice when it serves me, and with her, it doesn't serve me. In one night she flipped my world on its axis and there's no going back.Now, the only thing I can think about is her.But we both have secrets, and secrets fester like an open wound. They color the past and forecast the future, but I'm determined to open her up; free her from her memories so she can live the life she deserves. With me.I'm not a man that gives up without a fight. I've had a taste and there's no walking away.I just have to convince her that I'm not what she fears, I'm what she wants.
author: Adriane Leigh
